name: Executive Accommodation and Services
tag_list: mobile, wireless, technology, real-estate, commercial-real-estate, world-property-market, gsm, gsma, accommodations, event-planning, hotels, apartments, meeting, event-venues, cannes-tradeshows, barcelona-tradeshows, mipim2013, gsm2013, mapic, mipcom, can
overview: EAS – Executive Accommodation and Services (Licenced Travel Agency, ACAV and ASTA) We deliver a complete service tailored to specific demands during tradeshows and all corporate events. We specialize in finding the most suitable venues to include accommodation, restaurants, meeting facilities etc, acting as a liaison using our experience and networks within the industry. Priding ourselves on personalized, professional and friendly service focusing on outstanding service before, during and after your stay with us. Our services include Corporate Accommodation, Corporate Event and Tradeshow Support, Meetings, Conferences, Investor Meetings, Marketing/Branding, and a complete list of concierge services.
